ygData.subject: RE: Unicorn horn
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hey - I ll take that to the bank.  Thanks Sartori =) Talies the Wanderer Check out the EverQuesting Bard: http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:01 AM 12/4/99 -0800, you wrote:

>http://everquest.gamestats.com/equipment/graphics6/Unicorn_Horn.htm
>
>Nowhere on there does it say "wind instrument" or "greater lightstone
>effect". If it has a greater lightstone effect I haven't noticed cuz I wear
>a froglok crown, and I use my guise when it's night (Ultravision is SO much
>better than Infra). If you don't know anyone with a horn and want to take
>your own screenshot, logon to Veeshan and give me a tell.


Hey - I'll take that to the bank. Thanks Sartori =)


Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
